PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-05512010-04-29,  ,  RC,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS, in order to update the list of elections provided for, to replace an outdated reference to the Canada Customs and Revenue Agency, and to add the names of foreign universities that meet the criteria for prescribed status to Schedule VIII. In addition, Schedule VIII is being updated to replace outdated references to four universities to reflect their current legal names.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0096 Publication Date: 2010-05-12
AttachmentsAttachment
